terms.content:
# Terms and Conditions of Contra Technologies

This document governs the use of our AI-based contract analysis and risk assessment service operated by Contra Technologies Ltd. and any related legal relationship with us in a legally binding way.

You must read this document carefully.

Our service is provided by:  
Contra Technologies Ltd., 6 Kacsóh Pongrác Street, 2132 Göd, Hungary (Company registration no.: 13-09-238567, VAT no.: 32743117-2-13)  
**Contact email:** admin@contraai.hu  

This document applies exclusively within the European Economic Area (EEA). If you intend to use the service outside the EEA, please contact us at admin@contraai.hu for further information.

## Nature of the Service – Important Notice

The AI-based contract interpretation system provided by Contra Technologies Ltd. is an Early Access version that is still under development. It is not a final or stable release and must be used with caution and entirely at your own risk. The Service Provider accepts no responsibility for any errors, misinterpretations, or damages, whether legal, financial, or otherwise, arising from the use of the service.

## Access to the Service

The service is not publicly available and may only be accessed upon request and approval by Contra Technologies Ltd. Access requests must be submitted through the “Request Access” function on our website. The Service Provider reserves the right to reject or revoke access at any time and without explanation. The service is currently available only to corporate users and not to private individuals.

## Not a Legal Service

The service does not constitute legal advice and does not replace attorney or legal counsel. Its sole purpose is to assist users in understanding contracts and legal documents, to simplify legal language, and to provide partial informational support for business decision-making. The service does not offer legal representation, does not determine the validity of contracts, and does not issue official legal opinions. In accordance with GDPR and relevant data protection laws, the service does not use, store, or process confidential or personal legal data for the purpose of legal activity.

## Data Security and Storage

Contra Technologies Ltd. is committed to protecting user data. All personal and contract-related information is stored in encrypted form on secure servers operated by Amazon Web Services EMEA SARL in Frankfurt, Germany. The service does not share personal data with third parties unless required by law. All AI-driven analytical processes are fully automated and carried out without human intervention.

## Limitation of Liability

The Service Provider shall not be liable for any direct or indirect damages resulting from the use of the service. It does not guarantee that the AI-based analyses are always accurate or complete and reserves the right to modify or suspend any part of the service at any time. Users are required to consult their own legal advisors before making any business or legal decisions based on information generated by the service.

## Modifications and Validity

These Terms and Conditions apply exclusively within the EEA. Different terms apply to users outside the EEA, who may request them via admin@contraai.hu. Contra Technologies Ltd. reserves the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Updates will be published on the website, and if changes are significant, registered users will be notified.

## Summary

The service is part of an Early Access program and is under development, used at your own risk. It is not publicly available and requires approval for access. It does not provide legal services or advice. All data is securely stored in Frankfurt, on AWS servers, without transmission to third parties. These Terms apply only within the European Economic Area.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
# Privacy Policy of Contra Technologies LLC

Our Privacy Policy was last updated on 2025.10.13.

This Privacy Policy describes our policies and procedures regarding the collection, use, storage, and protection of your personal data when using the AI-based legal services provided by Contra Technologies LLC It also explains your data protection rights and how we ensure the confidentiality and security of your information.

This Policy has been prepared in accordance with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (General Data Protection Regulation, GDPR) and other applicable national and EU data protection laws. It applies within the European Economic Area (EEA).

## Data Controller

The entity responsible for data processing is:
Contra Technologies LLC  
Address: 6 Kacsóh Pongrác Street, 2132 Göd, Hungary  
Contact person: Erik Gergely Bitemo  
Email: admin@contraai.hu  
VAT number: 32743117-2-13  

Contra Technologies LLC. acts as the data controller and ensures compliance with the GDPR.

## Personal Data We Collect

We collect personal data in the following ways:

### Data provided by you
When you contact us or use our services, we may request the following information: name, company name (for corporate clients), contact information, and data related to contract analysis or advisory activities.

### Automatically collected technical data
When you use our website, certain technical data are automatically recorded, including IP address, browser type and version, device type, and information collected via cookies.

### Cookies
Our website uses cookies to improve user experience, collect statistics, and support marketing purposes. You can modify cookie settings in your browser preferences.

### AI and Machine Learning Data
Since our services rely on artificial intelligence, our AI systems analyze and learn from data. The data you provide may be used to train and fine-tune AI models if required for service improvement. AI systems do not use any data that would require your explicit consent unless you have provided it. Our AI systems only train on anonymized or aggregated data, unless explicit consent for personal data processing has been granted.

### Data for AI model training
Our algorithms continuously learn from the data you provide to improve the accuracy and efficiency of our services. These data are used solely for system enhancement, and we ensure they are processed only for the purpose of service development.

## Purpose and Legal Basis of Data Processing

Your personal data are used for the following purposes: providing our legal AI services, improving AI models, enhancing user experience, offering customer support, and fulfilling legal obligations such as invoicing or compliance reporting.

The legal bases for data processing include: your consent, performance of a contract, fulfillment of legal obligations, and the legitimate interests of the Service Provider. As an AI-based service, certain data processing activities are necessary for system development and optimization, carried out in full compliance with GDPR.

## Data Protection Measures

We treat personal data confidentially and implement technical and organizational measures to ensure protection. These include encryption, restricted access, secure databases, regular risk assessments, SSL encryption, and continuous monitoring of AI systems to maintain privacy and integrity.

## Data Sharing

Personal data may only be shared with third parties under specific conditions: with service providers acting as processors (e.g., cloud or hosting services), to fulfill legal obligations, or to protect legal rights. All third parties must comply with GDPR requirements and ensure equivalent levels of protection.

## Transfer to Third Parties

We may share data with third parties in limited cases, such as with marketing partners (only with explicit consent), external service providers (e.g., payment or advertising platforms), or for AI model development using anonymized and encrypted data. Data may also be used for anonymized scientific research that does not allow identification of individuals.

## Your Rights

You have the right to access your data, request correction, deletion, or restriction of processing, and object to processing where applicable. You also have the right to data portability and to withdraw your consent at any time. Requests are fulfilled within 30 calendar days without undue delay.

## Complaints

If you believe your data have been processed unlawfully, you may contact us at admin@contraai.hu or file a complaint with your local data protection authority.

## Data Retention

Personal data are stored as long as necessary for the purpose of processing, but no longer than 5 years. After the purpose ceases, data are deleted or anonymized unless otherwise instructed by you.

## Changes to this Policy

Contra Technologies LLC reserves the right to amend this Privacy Policy at any time. Updates will be published on our website, and significant changes will be communicated to registered users via email. The revised version becomes effective upon publication.
